name: HTML
description: HTML, the foundational language of the web, which I use to create the structure and layout of websites, ensuring they are accessible, semantically correct, and visually appealing.

name: CSS
description: CSS, a powerful styling language that I utilize to enhance the visual appearance and layout of websites, creating engaging and responsive user interfaces.

name: JavaScript
description: JavaScript, a versatile and powerful programming language that enables me to create dynamic and interactive experiences on the web.

name: Vue.js
description: Vue.js, a progressive JavaScript framework renowned for its simplicity and efficiency in building interactive and responsive user interfaces for modern web applications.

name: Node.js
description: Node.js, a server-side JavaScript runtime that allows me to build scalable and efficient web applications with JavaScript on the backend.

name: MongoDB
description: MongoDB, a popular NoSQL database that I use to store and retrieve data in a flexible and scalable manner for web applications.
